parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

displayNames.description: The name used for display purposes

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

customerNames.description: The name that is displayed for the customer

customerName.description: The name that is displayed for the customer

communicationDevices.description: communication devices used by the customer.

phoneNumber.description: This field can contain the phone numbers of the customer.

smsNumber.description: The mobile telephone SMS number of the customer

communicationType.description: Communication type to the customer.Type should be one of Proposals, Alert, Compaign, New Product Update,Robinsons List, Statements.

preferredChannel.description: Preferred method of contact to the customer.

streets.description: The first line of Customer's base address

street.description: The first line of Customer's base address

legalId.description: Unique reference number of the legal documents

legalDocumentName.description: Name of the legal documents such as passport,driving licence etc

legalHolderName.description: Enabling a holders name to be stored.

legalIssueAuthorisedDate.description: Authorised date of the issued legal document.

legalIssueDate.description: Date on which legal document issued.

legalExpiredDate.description: Expired date of the legal document.

employStartDate.description: Starting date of the customer's employment.

residenceSince.description: The date since the user has obtained the residence.

residenceType.description: Residence type of the customer.Type should be one of Farmhouse, Independent house, Residential Apartment, Serviced Apartments

reverseJointRelationCode.description: Relationship code for the Related Customer.

jointRelationRoleId.description: Role of joint customer with this customer.

postingRestrictIds.description: Identifies any restrictions for posting entries that are imposed on a Customer.

postingRestrictId.description: Identifies any restrictions for posting entries that are imposed on a Customer.

customerStatus.description: The internal bank status of a customer

customerMnemonic.description: Specifies an alternative easy means of referencing the Customer

nationalityId.description: The identifier of the nationality of a legal entity

accountOfficerId.description: The identifier of the account officer

target.description: Specifies how the Customer is considered by the bank and how he fits in with the Account Officer's overall marketing strategy

maritalStatus.description: Identifies the marital status of the customer.

customerCompany.description: Branch of the customer. Accepts the id of the COMPANY which shares customer with currently signed in company

customerLiability.description: Indicates the customer consolidation number for credit grouping purposes,within the same branch/country.

postCode.description: Identifies the postal code for customer.

contactDate.description: Date that first contact was made with the Customer.

introducer.description: Name of the person who introduced the Customer to the bank

kycRelationship.description: Indicates the relationship this customer is being held in.

isKycComplete.description: To check information related to the customer has been collected and verified.

kycLastReviewDate.description: Date customer KYC information was last reviewed.

kycNextSystemReviewDate.description: Date system has calculated customer should next be reviewed.

kycNextReviewDate.description: Manual specification of next review date.

amlCheck.description: Describe the legal controls that is required by institutions to prevent or report Anti Money Laundering activities. It can have YES, SENT or NULL values.

amlResult.description: Describe the results of Anti Money Laundering.

amlLastResultDate.description: The last date of Anti Money Laundering result is performed.

isSecureMessage.description: To identify whether the customer will receive a SECURE message or not.

lastName.description: The last name of an individual
